accept_terms_conditions: I accept the general terms and conditions and privacy policy of Flexcavo GmbH
advantage_flexcavo_member: As a FlexcavoOS user you enjoy a variety of benefits
confirm_company_client: I confirm that I am an entrepreneur as defined by § 14 BGB (German Civil Code) and not a consumer as defined by § 13 BGB.
data_privacy_statement: Data protection is our priority. View privacy policy here.
firststep_intelligent_fleet: Your first step to a smart fleet
i_want_to_register: I would like to register now
link_to_datasheet: Click here for the data sheet
no_effort_data_prefilled: No additional effort, your data is already pre-filled
not_register: I do not want to register now
payment_details: The payment is possible by bank transfer. We will send you the payment details in our confirmation email.
price_information_detailed_2: Additional costs may be incurred when invoicing.
price_information_detailed_3: Transport 80 €/hour, cleaning 80 €/hour, refueling is done according to a flat rate and corresponds to 1.80 €/l diesel.
price_information_detailed_4: The daily rental price is based on a usage of 8 operating hours per working day, i.e. Monday to Friday. Each additional hour of use or part thereof is charged at 1/8 of the respective daily rental price.
price_information_detailed_5: Compensation for reduced hours does not take place. Early pick-up or late return is possible by arrangement. Subject to change without notice.
select_attachment_and_service: Please select your attachments and extra services
send_confirmation: We will send you a confirmation with the booking details shortly
set_password_registration: For registration please choose a password
thanks_for_booking: Thank you for your reservation with Flexcavo
